steps.content: “Just wanted to send this guy I'm dating a text that'll put a smile on his face. He’s been having a tough time at work lately, but I think he’s absolutely killing it! He’s organized, determined, and the hardest-working person I know. In my unbiased opinion, he should be running the company.” Focus compliments on his personality to show that you truly pay attention to him (and not just his appearance).

“Sometimes, it feels like I’m living in a dream because you’re my partner. Seriously, what did I do to deserve you? I can’t believe you’re mine most of the time, and I keep pinching myself to make sure our relationship is real.”

“I had a friend ask about my new boyfriend yesterday, and I said he’s obsessed with baseball, he’s incredibly good looking, and he’s the most intelligent person I’ve ever met. I mean, I can’t see anything I don’t like about him. Can you?” Spell out exactly what you like about him to make him feel loved and desired.

“I think I need to visit the doctor soon 😰. My brain stops working when you’re around, and I forget how to speak properly. It’s gotten so bad over the past few weeks, and I keep embarrassing myself every time we hang out. What should I do?!”

“Loving you is my favorite thing to do. It’s a billion times better than shopping, sleeping, eating, breathing…I just can’t get enough of you. I’d rather live in a world without coffee than a world without you! That’s how much you mean to me.” Compare him to other things you treasure to stress how much he means to you.

“This might seem out of the blue, but I wanted to let you know that you’re the best thing that’s ever happened to me. I never believed in soulmates until I met you, but it really feels like we were made for each other. I’m so lucky to be able to call you mine.”

“It’s crazy how you can go through life thinking you were complete until you fall in love. Now, I can’t even go 5 minutes without you! You’re my partner for life, and I’ll always be on your side. I’ve never loved anyone as much as I love you.” Express how you have his back at all times to make him feel supported.

“I’m the luckiest person in the world to be your partner, and I wake up feeling like I won the lottery because of you. You’re my sunshine, the reason I smile, the best part of my day, the list goes on...I fall more in love with you every day.”

“I really admire how optimistic you are, and I think the world would be a better place if everyone had 1/100th of the positivity you have. You always seem to find the silver lining in any situation, and it’s truly inspiring. I’ve never met anyone who thinks like you, and you really changed the way I view the world." Let him know exactly how he impacts your life to make him feel moved.

“Words can’t describe how much you mean to me. You make me feel safe and supported, and I haven’t felt this way in a long time. It scares me because I’ve never felt so loved by anyone, but I keep reminding myself to appreciate all the moments I have with you. I love you so much.”

“When I’m going through a tough time, everything fades away when I see your face. Just being by your side gives me the strength I need to get through the day, and you make me feel like everything’s going to be okay. I love you more than you will ever know.”

“I never knew I could love someone as much as I love you, but my heart keeps proving me wrong. I find new things I love about you every day, and it feels like my heart could just explode at any point. You’re the first person I want to tell when things go wrong or when they go right, and I feel like I can be my true self around you. I am beyond lucky to have fallen in love with my best friend.”

“I know I don’t say this enough, but thank you for being such an amazing partner. You make me laugh and smile, but more importantly, you make me want to become the best version of myself. I love you so much, and I’m forever grateful to you.”

“I noticed you organized everything in the kitchen yesterday, and I just wanted to say thank you. I’m going through a lot at work, and that really made my day. I can’t wait to see you later and kiss your handsome face!" Express gratitude for small errands or chores to show you don’t take him for granted.

“I appreciate you listening to me and just being here for me in general. You make me feel seen and heard, and I haven’t felt this way in forever. You’re genuinely the best partner I could ever ask for, and there are no words to express how much I appreciate you.”

“I just wanted to thank you for opening up to me, especially since I know it doesn’t come naturally to you. Being vulnerable is scary, but I feel even more connected to you now. Thank you for trusting me and sharing a side of yourself that others don’t get to see. I feel so lucky to have you as my partner, and I can’t wait to see our relationship grow!” Mention specific details about his personality to show him you know the real him.
“I’m so excited for our date tonight! I know I haven’t seen you yet, but you look really good in that suit. Seriously, the brand should just hire you to model it. They would make millions!”

“I have possibly the biggest meeting of my career today, but I can’t focus…I’m too distracted thinking about you. I’m coming over as soon as I leave the office!” If you want to spice things up, let him know that he’s on your mind to leave him wanting more.
“I had the hottest dream last night. You were in it, and things got pretty spicy…If you want to hear more, you’ll have to come over. I’ll save you a spot in my bed.”

“I was telling my friends about you the other day, and they didn’t believe I was describing a real person. And the more I thought about it, I wasn’t too sure either. I mean, there’s nothing I don’t like about you…I think you’re going to have to come over to prove you’re not just some figment of my imagination 😉.”

“I still can’t get over what you said yesterday…How is Shrek better than Shrek 2 ?! That’s just wrong. I feel like we need to schedule a movie marathon to refresh your memory and settle this once and for all!” Mention something from a previous conversation to start a conversation in a fun and flirty way.

“Hey, sleepyhead. ~Rise and shiiiiine~ *Kylie Jenner gif. You’re going to achieve great things today…unless you’re still asleep.” If you want to be playful over text , attach a funny meme or gif to add some personality.
“All I can think about is Taco Bell…and you, of course. You, and then Taco Bell. But seriously, all I want to do is eat tacos with you. That’s my dream Friday night. Is that sad?”
“Controversial question: Is it okay to eat in bed? I was super against it a few months ago, but now I don’t care. I would vacuum all the crumbs in the world for you.”
“My sister asked me about you yesterday. She couldn’t believe how much I was smiling, and she wanted to know why. You must be dopamine…because you make me really, really happy.”

“Even though we’ve completely ruined our sleep schedule at this point, there’s nothing I’d rather do than stay up and game with you. You’re the Link to my Zelda, the Mario to my Peach, the Tidus to my Yuna 🎮🥹🖤. I can’t wait to see our journey unfold.”
“Do you see the stars? They look so beautiful, but they have nothing on your eyes. They just don’t shine the same way. I guess you’re kind of out of this world 🌏✨🪐🌌🤪.”

“Harry Potter may be the Boy Who Lived, but you’re my Chosen One. Okay, this is my way of telling you that we’re having a movie marathon on Saturday, so prepare yourself. We’re going to have popcorn, blankets, and the entire set up 🤓🦉⚡.” Send your partner a silly pun from your favorite series to make them smile (or plan a romantic date).

“Morning, baby. I hope you slept well. I walked by your favorite coffee shop earlier today, and it made me think of you. Actually, scratch that, everything makes me think of you! Counting down the days until I get to see your handsome face…”

“Woke up thinking about you, baby. I really wish I could give you a hug right now and kiss your handsome face. I don’t know how I’m going to survive the next few weeks without you, so pray for me. I miss you so much!”

“My bed is really cold without you 😢. Promise me we’ll stay in bed for an entire week once you come home? I miss you so much, and I would do anything to have you here with me…I just want to hold you in my arms ❤️‍🩹.” Express love in a long distance relationship by letting your partner know just how much you miss him.

“I didn’t think it was possible to miss someone this much, but I’m going crazy without you! I miss driving you to work, walking to the park together, fighting over the last bite…next month can’t come soon enough. I can’t wait to kiss you and melt in your arms.”

“Morning, handsome. My alarm can go off multiple times, but my day doesn’t start until I hear your voice. You’re the last thing on my mind when I go to sleep and the first thing on my mind when I wake up. I hope you spend the day thinking of me…because I’ll be thinking of you.”

“Morning, my love. It’s finally the big day…I know you’re anxious about your presentation, but you got this! Just take a deep breath and try to stay calm. No matter what happens, I’m here for you, and I’m so proud of you! Good luck, and call me when you leave the office!” If your partner has a big meeting later in the day, remind him that he’s not alone and you have his back during his most stressful moments.

“I think you should just move in at this point…texting you 24/7 isn’t cutting it for me. I need to see your handsome face in the morning and cuddle with you in bed at night. You’re driving me insane!”
“Good morning, starshine…the earth says hello! I can’t wait to see you later, and I hope you have an amazing day at work. Knock it out of the park!”

“I know it’s late, but I just couldn't go to sleep without saying I love you. You're the last thing on my mind before I close my eyes, and I’m so incredibly grateful to have you in my life. I hope you sleep well and have the most magical dreams.” Let him know that you think about him right before bed to make him feel important in your life.

“I can't wait for the day when I can finally stop texting you goodnight…because I’d rather whisper it into your ear as we cuddle! Goodnight, baby. I wish you were in bed with me right now, but I guess I’ll just have to meet you in my dreams. Sleep tight.”

“Just wanted to remind you how much you mean to me before you doze off. You’re the best partner I could have ever asked for, and I still can’t believe you’re mine. I really feel like our love is one in a million. Thank you for making me feel so special and adored. Good night, baby.”

“Ugh, I really wish we didn’t have to sleep so we could talk all night long 😫. I had such an amazing time with you earlier, and I just wanted to thank you for showing me around! It was honestly the most fun I’ve had in a while, and I’ll be thinking about it until we meet up again. Sweet dreams ❤️.” Stress how much you enjoy his company to get his heart racing.

“Roses are red, violets are blue. The only thing sweeter than sleep is you. Happy Valentine’s Day, handsome! I know I don’t say this enough, but thank you for being such an amazing partner. I’m so lucky that I get to do life with you.”

“Happy birthday to the funniest and most handsome guy I know. You mean everything to me, and I can’t imagine my life without you. Wishing you the most magical day, and I hope all your dreams come true!”

“There’s nothing more I could ask for than spending the holidays with my favorite person on the planet. Merry Christmas, my love. I love you from head to mistletoe.” Add a silly holiday-inspired pun to end your paragraph on a positive note.

“Happy New Year! I’ve never kept up with resolutions, but that changes this year. You’ve really inspired me to become the best version of myself, and I know I can do anything I set my mind to. I can’t wait to see you tomorrow, and here’s to crushing all of our goals together!”
